title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: Flashing issue in the Control Example.
OB: Currently, there is excessive flashing occurring in the Control Example.
EB: The expected behavior is that only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, minimizing the flashing issue.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the Control Example and perform any action that triggers repainting of the frames. Observe the excessive flashing that occurs.
